about_the_game:
Beautiful World


Immerse yourself in a world filled with detailed and stunning locations, teeming with creatures of all kinds and a wealth of mysteries waiting to be uncovered.

Master your Shadowhunter


Become a skilled Shadowhunter, wielding a variety of ranged weapons and unique abilities to fight enemies. Improve your skills to unleash your full potential and dominate the battlefield.

Skills


Choose from several character classes, including Saints, Hunters, Vampires, and Undead, each with their own abilities for attacking, defending, and surviving. Customize your character with a variety of passive and active abilities to create your own unique playstyle.

Loot


Experience a loot generation system that generates truly unique and interesting items for your Night Hunter. Find new items by defeating enemies and bosses or by searching chests scattered throughout levels. The battles with bosses will be a thrilling trek in search of the best items.

Combat


Fight a variety of enemies, both monsters and humans, adapting to their unique fighting styles. Utilize a range of weapons and abilities to create a thrilling combat experience that will keep you engaged.

Dynamic change of day and night


Experience the dynamic change of day and night, utilizing your skills to adapt to the environment. During the day, hide in the shade to avoid the scorching sun, and at night, crush enemies without fear of light. You can even use abilities to not be afraid of the sun or switch day/night for strategic advantages.

Multiplayer


Team up with friends to collect loot and complete quests together, or compete against each other in challenging multiplayer modes.

Immerse yourself in a world filled with detailed and stunning locations, teeming with creatures of all kinds and a wealth of mysteries waiting to be uncovered.

name: Omnicide Vampire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 10300H \ Ryzen 5 5600H
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or RTX 3060 for Ray Tracing
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5345 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: i7 8700K
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070 or Nvidia GTX 3070 Ti For ray tracing
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5345 MB available space

short_description: Play an exciting top-down action RPG and become an unbeatable Night Hunter. You will have to fight alone or with friends, unlocking new abilities and obtaining unique weapons and equipment from the generated loot. Be a true hero and defeat the darkness in this thrilling world!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
